name: deleventy
description: This project is a Responsive Blog Template for Eleventy static site generator.
author: Dincer Degre <info@dincerdegre.com>

scripts.serve: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development eleventy --serve
scripts.watch: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development eleventy --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production eleventy
